title: Banned to prove ownership?
body:
Hi RIOT,
My account was banned yesterday because I need to prove ownership?
I can answer most of the security questions pertaining to my account like where it was created, Date of birth, previous emails on the account and anything regarding billing and charges on the account. I even still have the very first Visa I used on the account which was over 3 years ago (If you need the 4 last digits of the card)
I even have all the emails I got when I bought RP (I spent over $600 tbh) as well as the transaction ID's
I however do not remember what I spent my refund tokens on or my first 5 champs, I've been playing since season 3 and I have multiple accounts 
I can also recall my last gift received and who sent it, can someone from riot support please help

Summoner
TreesWthSeeds

replies.body: The questions are just to help verify ownership, and doesn't require a perfect score.  Really just do your best to answer, and it's totally okay to try again if it didn't pass the first time.  Our account team wants to recover your account, but we need to be absolutely sure it's going to the right owner.  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) if you need to submit another, and we'll see you there!

Thanks for the info! 
I was just wondering how long this process would take because I sent my ticket yesterday morning
